attributes.action: Chemtrails, stop spraying the citizens of the UK .
attributes.additional_details: I only recently started looking into this but in the course of a week I have observed regular spraying over Pembrokeshire . You dont need sofisticated equipement you only have to use your eyes .If after the aircraft has left and the vapor is still visible its a chemtrail.That chemtrail will turn into a cloud that is simply not possible with condensation alone . They contain aluminium,berium,strontium and other undesirable elements . We need to inform people of this clear danger to all of us .
attributes.background: Geoengineering is the artificial manipulation of the weather.I recently started looking into the chemtrail phenomina and found it is being carried out on a global scale .A contrail will dissipate in 20 plane lengths a chemtrail can go from horizon to horizon and does not dissipate .
